name: Vocational Services
description: Participants in the Pomeroy Recreation & Rehabilitation Center Vocational Program will explore career interests and have access to all appropriate services and support to fulfill their employment dreams or volunteer work. This includes training, resume preparation, job search support, peer counseling, on-the-job coaching, and more. Present and past positions have included: - Store clerk - Janitorial services - Bowling alley cashier - Ticketing at a museum - Cafés - Register - Gardening - Working

howToGetIt: For more information or to enroll in the Vocational Program contact: Kaiti Kelley kkelley@prrcsf.org (415) 213-8532
